rescuecore2.messages

Class AbstractMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.messages.AbstractMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCommand, AKAcknowledge, AKConnect, EntityIDRequest, EntityIDResponse, GKConnectError, GKConnectOK, KAConnectError, KAConnectOK, KASense, KGAcknowledge, KGConnect, KSCommands, KSConnectError, KSConnectOK, KSUpdate, KVConnectError, KVConnectOK, KVTimestep, Shutdown, SKAcknowledge, SKConnect, SKUpdate, VKAcknowledge, VKConnect

    public abstract class AbstractMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    An abstract base class for Message objects. This class is implemented in terms of MessageComponent objects so subclasses need only provide a urn and a list of MessageComponent objects.
